code: export var getSliderWidth=function getSliderWidth(){return window.innerWidth>=555?Math.ceil(window.innerWidth*72.2/100+96):window.innerWidth-48;};export var getCartLength=function getCartLength(){var cartWidth=272;var width=getSliderWidth();return Math.trunc(width/cartWidth);};export var getMargin=function getMargin(){var cartWidth=272;var width=getSliderWidth();var cartLength=getCartLength();return Math.trunc((width-cartWidth*cartLength)/(cartLength-1));};export var getMarginLeft=function getMarginLeft(){var cartWidth=272;var width=getSliderWidth();var cartLength=getCartLength();return cartLength===1?Math.trunc(width-cartWidth):0;};
